text:
Found a little bug in the default search results module in Edge, with the pagination. <https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/platform/issues/18156339/>
Apparently, Edge errors on feeding a URLSearchParams into another URLSearchParams, which causes a problem in the parts of the script where it's setting the nextParams and prevParams. A simple fix is to call toString() on the argument, as outlined in that bug report, like so: `var nextParams = new URLSearchParams(params.toString());`
Technically this is more a bug with Edge than with the search module, but whatyagonnado
